page.title: 05Employment,Stevington
page.content: There are about two hundred and forty households.Some sixty of these consist of single pensioners and retired couples.The rest are supported by employment which is found mainly outside the village-namely in Bedford, the surrounding area,London or worldwide.Many of these households have two or more adults working.Among the majority who travel away for their employment there is a great range of occupations: computing,industrial research,photography,medicine, architecture,engineering,teaching, auctioneering,estate agency,university teaching,consultancy,surveying,law, banking,shopkeeping,building, decorating,railways,local government, civil service,police,social service,nursing are some.There is some unemployment,mainly among the young but it is not a noticeable feature.
